statements: CREATE TABLE smart_home_devices ( device_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, device_name VARCHAR(50), device_type VARCHAR(50), room_name VARCHAR(50), owner_id INT, active BOOLEAN default TRUE );
CREATE TABLE example_table_1 ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, age INT NOT NULL, city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW() )

CREATE TABLE example_table_2 ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, description TEXT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, user_id INT NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES example_table_1(id) ON DELETE CASCADE )

CREATE TABLE example_table_3 ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, device_id INT NOT NULL, event_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), event_description TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES example_table_2(id) ON DELETE CASCADE )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS houses (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE devices (device_id INT PRIMARY KEY, device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id));
CREATE TABLE rooms (room_id INT PRIMARY KEY, room_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
